item.title: Azeeza Easa
item.content:
Azeeza Easa is an accomplished educational leader with 40+ years of experience in shaping schools and strengthening educational systems in India.

She holds an M.A. in Psychology, M.Ed., and has attended a course in Master Trainer Training for Cambridge International Diploma for Teachers and Trainers conducted by University of Cambridge International Examinations.

In addition, she has successfully completed the Auditor Training Course for School Â Education by Centre of Assessments for Excellence International (COAE)as per ISO 21001:2018 ( Management Systems for Educational Organisations) and has consistently enhanced her expertise through seminars and professional development programmes.
